Read4Me
  • Welcome to Read4Me’s documentation!
  • View page source

Welcome to Read4Me’s documentation!

Go the the Main Telegram Bot section to see what you can do with the bot and how it works.

In the Modules Documentation is described each module in detail with examples of usage.

In the Scripts section you will find a brief tutorial on how to generate a news dataset and how to create topic vectors for the bot.

To try the project or to modify it, see the Installation section.

The project consists of:

  • A Telegram bot that analyses the content of web pages.

  • Modules to build a news dataset, to process topics and documents, and to manage telegram user’s data.

  • Scripts to automate the corpus and topics creation and processing.

A streamlined view of the full execution can be summarized in few steps:

  1. The news dataset is built, and a list of topics is extracted from them.

  2. The topics are further processed obtaining fewer and more interpretable ones.

  3. The processed topics are then used by the bot as a base reference when analyzing documents and learning user reading preferences.
